roleset.name: to camp in the open
roleset.note: BIVOUAC-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from bivouac.01-v)

example.name: Bivouacking sounds scary
example.text: He started down at once but, overtaken by darkness and fearing crevasses, he bivouacked in a small crevasse without sleeping bag, tent or stove.
example.arg: overtaken by darkness and fearing crevasses
without sleeping bag, tent or stove

example.name: typical usage
example.text: He bivouacked within two miles of the town and sent out patrols to harass the enemy.
example.arg: within two miles of the town
